message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.MED, cs.HC 

The paper proposes a novel image-based hybrid motion control approach for using probe-based confocal laser endomicroscopy (pCLE) in retinal surgeries. The approach involves using a robot to assist with scanning the tissue precisely without hand tremors and an auto-focus image-based control algorithm to optimize the quality of pCLE images. This involves aspects of robotics (cs.RO), computer vision (cs.CV), multimedia (cs.MM), medical imaging (cs.MED), and human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
